name: The Association of European Producers of Steel for Packaging
goal: The goal of our organisation is to represent the interests of the APEAL member companies, European producers of steel for packaging, to promote steel as a packaging material and inform stakeholders of the performance and sustainable benefits of steel for packaging.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives: European environmental legislation, specifically waste and circular economy policy initiatives, food contact policy and sustainable industry.
